force-background.name: Force Background
force-background.description: Forces the game to render a certain background. 0 = disabled.

remove-controller-glyphs.name: Remove Controller Glyphs
remove-controller-glyphs.description: Removes controller glyphs and labels when playing with a controller connected

socials-confirmation.name: Socials Confirmation
socials-confirmation.description: Adds a confirmation popup to the Main Menu socials buttons.
